name: Mizz Survival
description:
"Mizz Survival" - A New Survival Game Where You Fight to Stay Alive in an Evolved Jungle Environment.

Introducing "Mizz Survival", a new survival game where you must fight to stay alive in a highly-evolved jungle environment. With two game modes - "Survival" and "Team Survival" - you'll have to face the harsh environment and other players trying to survive.

We've significantly improved the graphics to make the game more realistic and exciting. With "Mizz Survival", you'll have to fight like never before to stay alive. Are you ready to face

The Story

Players will be captured and thrown into the jungle to fight for their survival against wild animals and other players.

Key Features

Solo and team play
You can adventure alone or play with friends.
Weaponry
Develop your weapon
Weather conditions
Day and night
Open-world environment
Adventure in the openworld
Gathering
You can harvest different things to craft items needed to survive.
Building & Crafting
Create objects, various materials to use in survival.
Hunting
Hunt monsters to survive.
PK
You can fight with players together or co-op, or you can play team battle mode attacking the opposing team.

In "Mizz Survival", you'll have to rely on your survival skills to stay alive. The game features a dynamic environment that changes with the weather and time of day. You'll have to find shelter, build your own weapons, and hunt for food to survive.

The monsters in the game are also challenging and require different tactics to defeat. Whether you choose to play solo or team up with friends, "Mizz Survival" offers an immersive gaming experience that you won't forget.

Are you ready to fight for survival in an evolved jungle environment? Play "Mizz Survival" now!
